name: Too Many Red Guys
description:
Too Many Red Guys is a game made in two hours on stream for a challenge.

Now Updated! Play the new OR the old version!

Anyway, simple dodge/ jump on enemies, and collect as many coins as you can for as long as you can.

Press F to toggle fullscreen.

Made by Patrick Lerum (Happy Havok).

Don't know why I want my name associated with this.

Was a fun challenge nonetheless.
